<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// AMDGPUResourceUsageAnalysis gathers resource usage on a per-function</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// granularity. However, some resource info has to be assigned the call</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// transitive maximum or accumulative. For example, if A calls B and B&#39;s VGPR</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// usage exceeds A&#39;s, A should be assigned B&#39;s VGPR usage. Furthermore,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// functions with indirect calls should be assigned the module level maximum.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcresourceinfo/#a3681fb2c471c1278bfd939456c752f22">gatherResourceInfo</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
